evidence.quote: ALXN1720-oMG-303 is a Phase 3, randomized, double-masked, placebo-controlled, multicenter study

Approximately 168 eligible participants will be stratified by geographical region (eg, North America, Europe), steroid use at baseline (Yes or No) and baseline MGII ocular (PRO) score category (6 to 10, or 11 to 18) and randomized 1:1 to treatment with gefurulimab or placebo
The study will consist of 3 periods: Screening (< 4 weeks), RCT (12 weeks), and OLE (52 weeks)
receive a 600 mg loading dose of gefurulimab (or placebo) on Day 1, followed by 300 mg once weekly maintenance treatment with gefurulimab (or placebo)
The maximum overall study duration for active participants will be approximately 56 weeks (from Screening through OLE)

eligibility_inclusion.text: Adult participants > 18 years of age at time of signing the informed consent

evidence.quote: Adult participants > 18 years of age at time of signing the informed consent
AChR Ab+ oMG (MGFA Class I)

eligibility_inclusion.text: Positive serological test for AChR autoantibodies at Screening

evidence.quote: Positive serological test for AChR autoantibodies at Screening (previous test results, if applicable, must be confirmed by central laboratory during Screening)
Participants must weigh > 40 kg

eligibility_inclusion.text: Participants of childbearing potential must follow the contraception measures specified in protocol

evidence.quote: Participants of childbearing potential must follow the contraception measures specified in protocol.

eligibility_inclusion.text: Written informed consent from each study participant or the study participant's legal guardian

evidence.quote: The Investigator, or a person designated by the Investigator, will obtain written informed consent from each study participant or the study participant's legal guardian and the participant's assent, when applicable, before any study-specific activity is performed.

eligibility_inclusion.text: Vaccination against N meningitidis serogroups within 3 years prior to Day 1

evidence.quote: To reduce the risk of meningococcal infection, all participants must be vaccinated against NV meningitidis serogroups A, C, W135, Y, (and where available, serogroup B) within 3 years prior to Day 1.

eligibility_exclusion.text: Known other autoimmune disease that may affect study participation and results

evidence.quote: Known other autoimmune disease that may affect study participation and results in the opinion of PI and medical monitor

eligibility_exclusion.text: Any medical condition or risk factor that might interfere with participation

evidence.quote: Any medical condition or risk factor that, in the opinion of the PI or the Medical Monitor, might interfere with participation in the study, pose any added risk to the participant, or confound the assessment of safety or efficacy of the study intervention
History of N meningitidis infection

eligibility_exclusion.text: Positive pregnancy test at Screening or Day 1

evidence.quote: Participants who have a positive pregnancy test at Screening or Day 1.

eligibility_exclusion.text: Evidence of hepatitis B or hepatitis C viral infection

evidence.quote: Evidence of hepatitis B or hepatitis C viral infection or presence of HBsAg or HBcAb with negative surface antibody (anti-HBs), or HCV infection (HCV antibody positive, expect for participants with document successful treatment).

eligibility_exclusion.text: Pregnant, breastfeeding, or intending to conceive during the course of the study

evidence.quote: Pregnant, breastfeeding, or intending to conceive during the course of the study.

eligibility_exclusion.text: Employee or directly related to an employee of Alexion or the institution/investigational site

evidence.quote: Participant is an employee or directly related to an employee of Alexion or the institution/investigational site.

eligibility_exclusion.text: Unable or not willing to administer the study intervention

evidence.quote: Participant or caregiver unable or not willing to administer the study intervention.

eligibility_exclusion.text: Inability or unwillingness to adhere to the protocol requirements

evidence.quote: Inability or unwillingness to adhere to the protocol requirements and restrictions, including participation in scheduled study visits.

background_therapy.requirement: initiated ≥6 months before Day 1, stable dose ≥3 months

evidence.quote: Nonsteroidal immunosuppressive drugs (eg, azathioprine, methotrexate, cyclosporine, tacrolimus, mycophenolate mofetil, and cyclophosphamide) Initiated at least 6 months before Day 1 — No change in dosage during the 3 months before Day 1

background_therapy.requirement: initiated ≥3 months before screening, stable dose ≥28 days

evidence.quote: Steroids initiated at least 3 months (90 days) before Screening, with no change in dosage during 1 month (28 days) before Day 1
